mapper.select: SELECT p.post_code, p.user_code, u.name as writer, p.created_at, p.thumbnail, p.post_type FROM tbl_post p JOIN tbl_user u on (p.user_code = u.user_code) WHERE p.post_status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.challenge_code = #{ challengeCode } ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.post_code, p.user_code, u.name as writer, p.created_at, p.post_content, p.post_type, p.store_code, s.store_name, p.challenge_code, c.challenge_title, p.like, i.path, i.file_name FROM tbl_post p JOIN tbl_user u on (p.user_code = u.user_code) JOIN tbl_store s on (p.store_code = s.store_code) JOIN tbl_challenge c on (p.challenge_code = c.challenge_code) LEFT JOIN tbl_image i on (p.post_code = i.post_code) WHERE p.post_status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.post_code = #{ postCode } ORDER BY i.created_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_post (post_content, post_type, challenge_code, thumbnail, user_code) VALUES (#{postContent}, #{postType, typeHandler=sisosolsol.greenfire.common.handler.PostTypeHandler}, #{challengeCode}, #{thumbnail}, #{userCode})
